author: bowyabowya
post_text: November 6, 2016 at 9:34 AM#1HI all ~I have a question with how to set midi encorder and can use Align function.I use Touchosc 1.9.8Now i set my encorder cmd like thisnote1 Attribute $val At + $resnote2 Attribute $val At - $resnote3 SetVar $res= "1"note4 SetVar $val="pan"note5 Align"><"but i cant use Align function...when i change my value with midi encorder then Align function will turn off...anyone can teach me? Thanks alot!!!!
title: How to set midi encorder and can use Align function?
